name: Sun Seed Dash
description:
Play as an ever-moving 'lil sun seed
Navigate through a dangerous 'n fearful sky
Find that shrouded sun and make it bright again! 

---

Made as a first UNITY project for the Deynum's Completion Game Jam.
Late Submission.  There is only one level.

---

Controls: 
Move using:
    up: W
    right: D
    down: S
    left: A
Use mouse to click buttons including: [EXIT], [MENU], [WATER]

---

All art and music assets are original and are (c) Boxless Mushroom
